attributes.action: Remove Jacob Rees-Mogg from his position
attributes.additional_details: Remove Jacob Rees-Mogg from his position as he is failing to listen to the public he serves. Specifically in relation to dog crime and the need for tough sentences for these organised criminals who are kidnapping, abusing and murdering our pets.
attributes.background: Remove Jacob Rees-Mogg from his position due to his ignorance in understanding the issues put before him

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs or Ministers to be sacked or for them to resign.
